forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High around 20C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 67F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers overnight. Low 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then off and on rain showers overnight. Low 56F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 19C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 66F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 19C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High near 65F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low around 50F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 19C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Monday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 64F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 51F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and damp with rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending early. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 46F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 61F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 62F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.
